pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# SuperAnimeThe best package in Python to get anime information and anime gifs!## Installation:```pip install superanime```## Example Usage:```pyimport asynciofrom superanime import AnimeClientfrom superanime.ext.types import SFWGif, SearchTypeanime = AnimeClient() async def main(): await anime.start() # Starts the client gif = anime.gif( bucket=SFWGif.KISS, # Also works with strings! as_object=True # If you want to send a 'GifResult' object with additional info like anime name. Default to 'True' ) print(gif.url) # Print the GIF URL search = await anime.search( query="One Piece", # The query to search in kitsu.io type=SearchType.ANIME # The type of search you want to search for. ('ANIME' or 'MANGA') If none provided the anime type will be searched. ) print(search.name) # Print the Anime name if __name__ == "main": asyncio.run(main())```## Methods:```pysuperanime.AnimeClient(print_on_ready: bool = True) -> AnimeClientAnimeClient.gif(bucket: SFWGif | NSFWGif | str, as_object: bool = True) -> GifResultAnime.search(query: str, type: SearchType | str = None) -> SearchResult```
_~ Made by Noraa08 for MoonlightGroup_
